films.title: The Giant Gila Monster
films.description: A giant lizard terrorizes a rural Texas community and a heroic teenager attempts to destroy the creature.

films.title: Manos: The Hands Of Fate
films.description: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

films.title: Plan 9 from Outer Space
films.description: Aliens resurrect dead humans to attack Earth as a means to stop humanity from creating a doomsday weapon.

films.title: Robot Monster
films.description: A robot alien attempts to annihilate the last humans on Earth, but finds himself conflicted over love for one of them.

films.title: The Room
films.description: Johnny is a successful banker with great respect for his friends, but his life changes when his fianc√©e betrays him.

films.title: Troll 2
films.description: A family is stalked by vegetarian goblins who want to turn them into plants.

films.title: Birdemic: Shock and Terror
films.description: A romantic couple faces an apocalyptic world where birds attack humanity.

films.title: Sharknado
films.description: A freak hurricane unleashes a swarm of killer sharks in Los Angeles.

films.title: The Amazing Bulk
films.description: A scientist turns into a giant green creature after a failed experiment.

films.title: Space Mutiny
films.description: A crew fights against a deadly rebel group on a space station.

films.title: Robot Jox
films.description: In the future, giant robots are used to resolve conflicts between nations.

films.title: Attack of the Giant Leeches
films.description: Mutated leeches terrorize a small town in the Everglades.

films.title: Robot Holocaust
films.description: Humans must fight for survival in a post-apocalyptic world dominated by robots.

films.title: Samurai Cop
films.description: A cop teams up with a partner to stop a criminal gang in Los Angeles.

films.title: Miami Connection
films.description: A rock band fights against a gang of ninjas in Miami.
